name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, you aggressively attack.  Make a melee attack, dealing 1d12 + MOVE ground damage on a hit.  If you last attack missed, double the dice roll for damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
